name: common

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: a free-text description of this biocharacteristic
flag for negating this biocharacteristic_class object; a "false" is assumed as default and does not have to be stated
attributes.name: negated

attributes.description: the value in a format correstponding to type
attributes.name: value

attributes.description:
A text representation, preferably using standard geographic identification elements, of the corresponding latitude,longitude(,altitude). This representation serves the purposes to
  - capture standard data entry parameters
  - provide a sanity check for latitude,longitude values
attributes.name: label

attributes.description: signed decimal degrees (North, relative to Equator)
attributes.name: latitude
longitude
attributes.description: signed decimal degrees (East, relative to IERS Reference Meridian)

attributes.name: altitude
attributes.description: height in meters above the WGS 84 reference ellipsoid; otional

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: properly prefixed CURIE of the ontology term
the text label associated with the term
attributes.name: label
id
attributes.description: properly prefixed CURIE of the external reference
the relation of the external reference to the object it was pointed from
attributes.name: relation

description: This file is used for the definition of some prototype objects which are re-used in other schema documents.
